member.name: M:CompanySystemWebAPI.Controllers.EmployeesController.PutEmployee(System.Int32,CompanySystemWebAPI.Dtos.EmployeesAddDto.EmployeesAddDto)
member.summary: Update employee data by ID
member.remarks:
Sample request:
PUT /Employees/1 { "fName": "Santino", "lName": "Morello", "address": "Cruce Casa de Postas 97, Spain", "dob": "1975-02-22", "sex": "Male", "position": "Supervisor", "deptNo": null }
member.returns: return employee data that just updated

member.remarks:
